activities.name: If pipeline is has in a another process

dependsOn.activity: If pipeline is has in a another process
If pipeline is has in a another process

text.value:
/* Get CDC Programs */
/* v1.0.1 */
/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

set is_change = FALSE;
set is_index = FALSE;
set is_change_all = FALSE;

set Now = getdate()::datetime;
set TransactionId = '@{variables('TransactionId')}';

declare res resultset;
begin
    /* For Program that is not running, set StagingStatus to None */
    update rs_schema.OfferProgramRuns
    set StagingStatus = 0
    where (Status <> 1 and StagingStatus = 2) or StagingStatus is null;

    /* Set effective ProgramRuns status (to Running) */
    update rs_schema.OfferProgramRuns
    set Status = 1
    where (ScheduledTime <= $Now and StartDate <= $Now and $Now <= EndDate and Status = 0);

    /* Set status of Finish ProgramRuns */
    update rs_schema.OfferProgramRuns
    set Status = 2
    where (EndDate < $Now and Status <> 2);

    /* insert into programchange: program, programrun, programrunpool */

    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    /* Search for a program that has recenty been modified */
    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    create or replace temporary table rs_schema.temp_program_changes (id nvarchar(256));

    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.offerprogram_check)) then
        insert into rs_schema.temp_program_changes (id)
        select id from rs_schema.offerprogram_check;
    end if;

    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.offerprogramruns_check)) then
        truncate table Rs_Schema.OfferProgramruns_delta;

        insert into Rs_Schema.OfferProgramruns_delta
        select * from Rs_Schema.OfferProgramruns_check
        where Metadata$Action != 'DELETE' or (Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate = FALSE);

        insert into rs_schema.temp_program_changes (id)
        select programId from Rs_Schema.OfferProgramruns_delta;
    end if;

    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.offerrunpool_check)) then
        insert into rs_schema.temp_program_changes (id)
        select b.programId
        from rs_schema.offerrunpool_check a
        join rs_schema.offerprogramruns b on b.id = a.programrunId;
    end if;


    /* If there exists a recently modified program: */
    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.temp_program_changes)) then
        set is_change = TRUE;

        insert into rs_schema.program_changes (id,programcode, transactionid, createdDate)
        select distinct b.id, b.programcode, $TransactionId, $Now from rs_schema.temp_program_changes a
        join rs_schema.offerprogram b on a.id = b.id;

        if (
            (
                select count(*) 
                from rs_schema.offerprogramruns
                where status = 1 and ProgramId not in (select id from rs_schema.program_changes where transactionId = $TransactionId)
            ) = 0
        ) then
            set is_change_all = TRUE;
        end if;

    end if;


    if ($is_change = TRUE) then
        set is_index = TRUE;

        insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, Description, ProgramCode)
        select	$TransactionId, 'Staging by program changes', 'Staging offer in program', ProgramCode
        from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId;

        truncate table RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning;

        insert into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning (
                        Id,ProgramCode, ProgramEngine,RunId,CampaignCode,PromotionCode, OfferId,Name,OfferCode,StoreCode,Description,FullDescription,OfferType,ImageUrl,
                        OfferSegment,MemberAccount,Provider, MemberAccountLoadQuantity,DiscountPricing,Size,Disclaimer,StartDate,EndDate,PromotionStartDate,PromotionEndDate,IsActive,
                        /* Product */
                        ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, Movement,DepartmentCode1,DepartmentCode2,DepartmentCode3,DepartmentName1,DepartmentName2,DepartmentName3,IsOnSale,IsSingleProduct)
            with CTE_Offer as (
                select 
                    *,
                    ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by ProgramCode, StoreCode, offerUnique.Id, offerUnique.PrimaryUPC order by offerUnique.Movement desc, IsOnSale desc) as rn
                from (
                    select 
                        program.ProgramCode, program.Engine as ProgramEngine, runs.Id as RunId, campaign.CampaignCode, promotion.PromotionCode,
                        offer.id, offer.Name, offer.OfferCode, OfferStore.StoreCode, offer.Description, offer.FullDescription, offer.OfferType, offer.ImageUrl,
                        offer.OfferSegment, offer.MemberAccount, offer.DiscountPricing, offer.Size, offer.Disclaimer, offer.StartDate, offer.EndDate,
                        offer.Provider, offer.MemberAccountLoadQuantity, offer.IsActive,
                        promotion.StartDate as PromotionStartDate,
                        promotion.EndDate as PromotionEndDate,
                        Product.ProductCode, Product.PrimaryUPC, Product.Movement, Product.DepartmentCode1, Product.DepartmentCode2, Product.DepartmentCode3,
                        Product.DepartmentName1, Product.DepartmentName2, Product.DepartmentName3,
                        case 
                            when Campaign.CampaignCode in ('-1')
                                or Campaign.Description = 'Business owned ad promotion' then 1 
                            else 0
                        end as IsOnSale -- weekly ad;
                    from  RS_SCHEMA.OfferProgram as program
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.OfferProgramRuns as runs on runs.ProgramId = program.Id
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.OfferRunPool as pool on runs.Id = pool.ProgramRunId
                    left join RS_SCHEMA.Campaign as poolCampaign on (poolCampaign.Id = pool.Value and pool.Type = 0)
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.Promotion as promotion on (promotion.Id = pool.Value and pool.Type = 1) or promotion.CampaignId = poolCampaign.Id
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.Campaign as campaign on campaign.Id = promotion.CampaignId
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.OfferPromotion as offerPromotion on offerPromotion.PromotionId = promotion.Id
                    inner join RS_SCHEMA.Offer as offer on offer.Id = offerPromotion.OfferId or (offer.Id = pool.Value and pool.Type = 2)
                    left join RS_SCHEMA.OfferProduct on OfferProduct.OfferId = offer.Id
                    left join RS_SCHEMA.Product on Product.ProductCode = OfferProduct.ProductCode
                    /* Only joined with OfferStore for program: OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS, PERSONALIZED_DEALS, TARGET_STORE, TARGET_USER, WEEKLY_OFFERS */
                    left join RS_SCHEMA.OfferStore 
                        on (
                            OfferStore.OfferId = offer.Id
                            and program.Engine != 'MASS' and program.Engine != 'NEW_ENROLLMENT'
                            and program.Engine !='TARGET_LIST' and program.Engine !='HEALTH' -- not mass,new member,first appdownload,health!
                            and (program.Engine !='AUTODEAL' or (program.Engine ='AUTODEAL' and offer.OfferType != 0)) -- not autodeal mass
                            and program.Engine !='CONTINUITY' --not continuity
                        )
                    where 
                        /* ProgramRuns that is running */
                        runs.status = 1
                        and (program.IsDeleted is null or program.IsDeleted = 0)
                        and (runs.IsDeleted is null or runs.IsDeleted = 0)

                        /* Always correct condition? */
                        and ($is_change = TRUE
                                or (program.id in (select id from  RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId))
                            )
                        and (poolCampaign.IsDeleted is null or poolCampaign.IsDeleted = 0)
                        and (campaign.IsDeleted is null or campaign.IsDeleted = 0)
                        and (promotion.IsDeleted is null or promotion.IsDeleted = 0)
                        and (
                                ((program.EnablePreview is null or program.EnablePreview = 0) and promotion.StartDate <= $Now and $Now <= promotion.EndDate)
                                or (program.EnablePreview = 1 and promotion.StartDate <= runs.PreviewEndTime and runs.PreviewStartTime <= promotion.EndDate)
                            )
                        and (
                                ((program.EnablePreview is null or program.EnablePreview = 0) and offer.StartDate <= $Now and $Now <= offer.EndDate)
                                or (program.EnablePreview = 1 and offer.StartDate <= runs.PreviewEndTime and runs.PreviewStartTime <= offer.EndDate)
                            )

                        /* For OFFER_RECO engine, the related Product must exists */
                        /* Otherwise, the Provider must match */
                        and (
                            (program.Engine = 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS'
                                and product.ProductCode is not null -- must have product
                                and (OfferProduct.IsDeleted is null or OfferProduct.IsDeleted = 0)
                                and (Product.DepartmentCode1 is not null and Product.DepartmentCode1 <>'')
                                and (Product.IsDeleted is null or Product.IsDeleted = 0)
                            )
                            or ( program.Engine <> 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS'
                                and offer.Provider = program.Provider
                            )
                        )
                        and (offer.IsDeleted is null or offer.IsDeleted = 0)

                        /* For NEW_ENROLLMENT and TARGET_LIST Engine, the Offer don't have to be active */
                        and (
                                program.Engine = 'NEW_ENROLLMENT'
                                or program.Engine = 'TARGET_LIST'
                                or offer.IsActive = 1
                            )
                        and offer.DiscountPricing is not null and offer.DiscountPricing <> ''
                        and offer.Name is not null and offer.Name <> ''
                        and offer.ImageUrl is not null and offer.ImageUrl <> ''

                        /* Program Engine - Offer Scope matching */
                        and (
                            (program.Engine = 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                            or (program.Engine = 'MASS' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                            or (program.Engine = 'TARGET_STORE' and offer.OfferType = 1)
                            or (program.Engine = 'TARGET_USER' and (offer.OfferType = 2 or offer.OfferType = 3))
                            or (program.Engine = 'NEW_ENROLLMENT' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                            or (program.Engine = 'TARGET_LIST' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                            or (program.Engine = 'HEALTH' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                            or (program.Engine = 'AUTODEAL' and (offer.OfferType = 0 or offer.OfferType = 2))
                            or (program.Engine = 'CONTINUITY' and offer.OfferType = 0)
                        )
                        and (OfferStore.IsDeleted is null or OfferStore.IsDeleted = 0)
                    ) as offerUnique
                )
            select
                ProgramCode || ifnull(StoreCode,'|') || id || ifnull(PrimaryUPC,'|') as Id,
                ProgramCode,
                ProgramEngine,
                RunId,
                CampaignCode,
                PromotionCode,
                -- offer
                id as OfferId,
                Name,
                OfferCode,
                StoreCode,
                Description,
                FullDescription,
                OfferType,
                ImageUrl,
                OfferSegment,
                MemberAccount,
                Provider,
                MemberAccountLoadQuantity,
                DiscountPricing,
                Size,
                Disclaimer,
                StartDate,
                EndDate,
                PromotionStartDate,
                PromotionEndDate,
                IsActive,
                -- product
                ProductCode,
                PrimaryUPC,
                Movement,
                DepartmentCode1,
                DepartmentCode2,
                DepartmentCode3,
                DepartmentName1,
                DepartmentName2,
                DepartmentName3,
                IsOnSale,
                1 -- single product default
            from CTE_Offer main where rn = 1;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* For Product with many different UPC, set IsSingleProduct to TRUE */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from Rs_Schema.tmp_table;
            insert into Rs_Schema.tmp_table (
                select *
                from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning as main
                where (select count(*)
                    from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning sub
                    where sub.ProgramCode = main.ProgramCode
                        and sub.OfferId = main.OfferId
                        and sub.StoreCode = main.StoreCode
                        and sub.PrimaryUPC <> main.PrimaryUPC) > 0);

            update Rs_Schema.tmp_table
            set isSingleProduct = 0;

            delete from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning where id in (select id from rs_schema.tmp_table);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning
            select * from rs_schema.tmp_table;


            if ($is_change = true) then
                insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
                select $TransactionId,'Done Staged all offer',ProgramCode, RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
                from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning group by ProgramCode, RunId;
            else
                insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
                select $TransactionId,'Done Staged Change via cdc',ProgramCode, RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
                from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning group by ProgramCode, RunId;
            end if;


            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_Available */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete
            from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_Available main
                using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine <> 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS') staged
            where main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                  and main.RunId = staged.RunId (+)
            and main.OfferId = staged.OfferId (+)
            and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_Available main
            using (
                select RunId, ProgramEngine, ProgramCode, OfferId, OfferCode, MemberAccount
                from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning
                where ProgramEngine <> 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS'
                group by RunId, ProgramEngine, ProgramCode, OfferId, OfferCode, MemberAccount
            ) staged
                on staged.RunId = main.RunId 
                   and staged.OfferId = main.OfferId
            when matched then update set
                OfferCode =  staged.OfferCode,
                MemberAccount =  staged.MemberAccount

            when not matched then insert
                (RunId, ProgramEngine, ProgramCode,OfferId, OfferCode, MemberAccount)
            values
                (RunId, ProgramEngine, ProgramCode,OfferId, OfferCode, MemberAccount);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_Available', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_Available staging
            group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_RECO */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS') staged
                where 
                    main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from  RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                    and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                    and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine  = 'OFFER_RECOMMENDATIONS' ) staged
                on staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        Offercode = staged.Offercode,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        Movement = staged.Movement,
                                        IsOnSale = staged.IsOnSale,
                                        IsSingleProduct = staged.IsSingleProduct,
                                        DepartmentCode1 = staged.DepartmentCode1,
                                        DepartmentCode2 = staged.DepartmentCode2,
                                        DepartmentCode3 = staged.DepartmentCode3,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DepartmentName2 = staged.DepartmentName2,
                                        DepartmentName3 = staged.DepartmentName3
            when not matched then insert
                (
                    Id, Offercode, ProgramCode, RunId, StoreCode, OfferId, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, Movement, IsOnSale, IsSingleProduct,
                    DepartmentCode1, DepartmentCode2, DepartmentCode3, DepartmentName1, DepartmentName2, DepartmentName3
                )
            values
                (
                    Id, Offercode, ProgramCode, RunId, StoreCode, OfferId, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, Movement, IsOnSale, IsSingleProduct,
                    DepartmentCode1, DepartmentCode2, DepartmentCode3, DepartmentName1, DepartmentName2, DepartmentName3
                );

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_RECO', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_RECO staging group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_Mass */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
            using (
                select *
                from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning
                where ProgramEngine in ('MASS','HEALTH','AUTODEAL','CONTINUITY')
            ) as staged
            where
                main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine in ('MASS','HEALTH','AUTODEAL','CONTINUITY') and OfferType = 0) staged
                on  staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        OfferCode = staged.OfferCode,
                                        Name = staged.Name,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DiscountPricing = staged.DiscountPricing
            when not matched then insert
                (Id,ProgramCode,RunId,OfferId,OfferCode,Name,StartDate,ProductCode,PrimaryUPC,DepartmentName1,DiscountPricing)
            values
                (Id,ProgramCode,RunId,OfferId,OfferCode,Name,StartDate,ProductCode,PrimaryUPC,DepartmentName1,DiscountPricing);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_Mass', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_Mass staging group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'TARGET_STORE') staged
            where
                main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from  RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'TARGET_STORE' ) staged
                on  staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        OfferCode = staged.OfferCode,
                                        Name = staged.Name,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DiscountPricing = staged.DiscountPricing
            when not matched then insert
                (Id, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
            values
                (Id, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore staging group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine in ('TARGET_USER','AUTODEAL')) AS staged
                where
                main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from  RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine in ('TARGET_USER','AUTODEAL') and OfferType = 2) staged
                on  staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        OfferCode = staged.OfferCode,
                                        Name = staged.Name,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DiscountPricing = staged.DiscountPricing
            when not matched then insert
            (Id,ProgramCode,StoreCode,RunId,OfferId,OfferCode,Name,StartDate,ProductCode,PrimaryUPC,DepartmentName1,DiscountPricing)
            values
                (Id,ProgramCode,StoreCode,RunId,OfferId,OfferCode,Name,StartDate,ProductCode,PrimaryUPC,DepartmentName1,DiscountPricing);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser staging group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'NEW_ENROLLMENT') staged
                where
                main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'NEW_ENROLLMENT' ) staged
                on  staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        OfferCode = staged.OfferCode,
                                        Name = staged.Name,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DiscountPricing = staged.DiscountPricing,
                                        IsActive =  staged.IsActive
            when not matched then insert
                (Id, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
            values
                (Id, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive);

            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment staging group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            delete from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'TARGET_LIST') staged
                where
                    main.ProgramCode in (select ProgramCode from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes Where TransactionId = $TransactionId)
                    and main.Id = staged.Id(+)
                    and staged.Id is null;

            merge into RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
            using (select * from RS_SCHEMA.OfferStagingRuning where ProgramEngine = 'TARGET_LIST') staged
                on staged.Id = main.Id
            when matched then update set
                                        OfferCode = staged.OfferCode,
                                        Name = staged.Name,
                                        StartDate = staged.StartDate,
                                        ProductCode = staged.ProductCode,
                                        DepartmentName1 = staged.DepartmentName1,
                                        DiscountPricing = staged.DiscountPricing,
                                        IsActive =  staged.IsActive
            when not matched then insert
                (Id, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
            values
                (Id, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate, ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive);


            insert into Rs_Schema.OfferStagingLog (TransactionId, Action, ProgramCode, RunId, Description)
            select $TransactionId, 'Done modify OfferStagingRuning_TargetList', staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId, 'Total: ' || count(*) || ' record'
            from Rs_Schema.OfferStagingRuning_TargetList staging
            group by staging.ProgramCode, staging.RunId;

            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            /* Finish staging runs, set status to Staged */
            /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
            update rs_schema.offerprogramruns set stagingstatus = 2
            where status = 1 and programId in (select Id from RS_SCHEMA.program_changes);

        end if;

    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    /* CDC for CustomerToOffer */
    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.CustomerToOffer_check)) then
        set is_index = TRUE;

        insert into Rs_Schema.CustomerToOffer_delta
              (CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, RECORANK, PRODUCTCODE, RECOTYPE, PROMOTIONCODE, CAMPAIGNCODE, SOURCE, transactionId, CreatedDate, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE, METADATA$ROW_ID)
        select CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, RECORANK, PRODUCTCODE, RECOTYPE, PROMOTIONCODE, CAMPAIGNCODE, SOURCE, $TransactionId ,$Now, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE, METADATA$ROW_ID
            from rs_schema.CustomerToOffer_check
        where Metadata$Action != 'DELETE' or (Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate = FALSE);

    end if;

    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    /* CDC for CustomerToProduct */
    /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
    if (exists(select top 1 1 from rs_schema.CustomerToProduct_check)) then
        set is_index = TRUE;

        insert into Rs_Schema.CustomerToProduct_delta 
              (CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, PROMOTIONCODE, CAMPAIGNCODE, SOURCE, transactionId, CreatedDate, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE, METADATA$ROW_ID)
        select CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, PROMOTIONCODE, CAMPAIGNCODE, SOURCE, $TransactionId , $Now, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE, METADATA$ROW_ID
            from rs_schema.CustomerToProduct_check
        where Metadata$Action != 'DELETE' or (Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate = FALSE);
    end if;

    res := (select $is_change as is_change, $is_index as is_index, $is_change_all as is_change_all);
    return table(res);
end;

activities.name: If is stage data - send mail

expression.value: @equals(activity('get cdc offer or program').output.resultSets[sub(int(activity('get cdc offer or program').output.resultSetCount),1)].rows[0].IS_CHANGE,true)
@equals(activity('get cdc offer or program').output.resultSets[sub(int(activity('get cdc offer or program').output.resultSetCount),1)].rows[0].IS_INDEX,true)

dependsOn.activity: If is stage data - send mail

query.value: select  Action, ProgramCode,RunId, Logtime, Description from rs_schema.offerstaginglog where TransactionId= '@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'  order by logtime

select CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE ,METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE
from RS_SCHEMA.CUSTOMERTOOFFER_DELTA  where transactionid ='@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
group BY CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE

select CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE
from RS_SCHEMA.CUSTOMERTOPRODUCT_DELTA  where transactionid ='@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
group BY CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE

text.value:
-- Stage 4 - version 2.0.1

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- OfferStagingRuning_*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Available
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_Available
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] staging
                  ON main.OfferId = staging.OfferId
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_Available
    SET ProgramCode   = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId         = staging.RunId
      , OfferCode     = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramEngine = staging.ProgramEngine
      , MemberAccount = IIF(staging.MemberAccount = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, staging.MemberAccount))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] staging
                  ON main.OfferId = staging.OfferId
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_Available (OfferId, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferCode, ProgramEngine, MemberAccount)
    SELECT OfferId
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramEngine
         , IIF(MemberAccount = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, MemberAccount))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END;


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Mass
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_Mass
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_Mass
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_Mass ( Id, ProgramCode, OfferCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate, ProductCode
                                        , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , OfferCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetStore
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore
    SET OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate
                                               , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , StoreCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetList
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetList
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetList
    SET Id              = staging.Id
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
      , IsActive        = IIF(staging.IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsActive))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetList ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate, ProductCode
                                              , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
         , IIF(IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsActive))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetUser
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser ( Id, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate
                                              , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , StoreCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , OfferCode
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- NewEnrollment
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
      , IsActive        = IIF(staging.IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsActive))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment ( Id, ProgramCode, OfferCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate
                                                 , ProductCode
                                                 , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , OfferCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
         , IIF(IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsActive))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- RECO
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_RECO
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_RECO
    SET OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , Movement        = IIF(staging.Movement = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, staging.Movement))
      , IsOnSale        = IIF(staging.IsOnSale = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsOnSale))
      , IsSingleProduct = IIF(staging.IsSingleProduct = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsSingleProduct))
      , DepartmentCode1 = staging.DepartmentCode1
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DepartmentCode2 = staging.DepartmentCode2
      , DepartmentName2 = staging.DepartmentName2
      , DepartmentCode3 = staging.DepartmentCode3
      , DepartmentName3 = staging.DepartmentName3
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_RECO ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, RunId, StoreCode, OfferId, StartDate
                                        , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, Movement, IsOnSale, IsSingleProduct
                                        , DepartmentCode1, DepartmentName1, DepartmentCode2, DepartmentName2
                                        , DepartmentCode3, DepartmentName3)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , StoreCode
         , OfferId
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , IIF(Movement = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, Movement))
         , IIF(IsOnSale = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsOnSale))
         , IIF(IsSingleProduct = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsSingleProduct))
         , DepartmentCode1
         , DepartmentName1
         , DepartmentCode2
         , DepartmentName2
         , DepartmentCode3
         , DepartmentName3
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- OfferProgramRuns
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE OfferProgramruns
SET status        = staging.status
  , stagingstatus = staging.stagingstatus
FROM OfferProgramruns main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferProgramruns_Delta] staging ON main.Id = staging.Id
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 1;

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- CustomerToOffer
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DELETE CustomerToOffer
FROM CustomerToOffer main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToOffer_Delta] staging
              ON main.OfferCode = staging.OfferCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

INSERT INTO CustomerToOffer (OfferCode, CustomerCode)
SELECT staging.OfferCode, staging.CustomerCode
FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToOffer_Delta] staging
         LEFT JOIN CustomerToOffer main
                   ON main.OfferCode = staging.OfferCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0
  AND main.OfferCode IS NULL;


-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-144413-CustomerCode] ON [CustomerToProduct];
-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-150823-ProductCode] ON [CustomerToProduct];
-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20210609-225408-RecoRank] ON [CustomerToProduct];
--
-- ALTER TABLE [CustomerToProduct]
--     DROP CONSTRAINT PK_CustomerToOffer;
--
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-144413-CustomerCode] ON [CustomerToProduct] (CustomerCode);
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-150823-ProductCode] ON [CustomerToProduct] (ProductCode);
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20210609-225408-RecoRank] ON [CustomerToProduct] (RecoRank);
-- ALTER TABLE [customertoproduct]
--     ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CustomerToOffer PRIMARY KEY (CustomerCode, ProductCode);

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- CustomerToProduct
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DELETE CustomerToProduct
FROM CustomerToProduct main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToProduct_Delta] staging
              ON main.ProductCode = staging.ProductCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

INSERT INTO CustomerToProduct (ProductCode, CustomerCode, RecoRank, RecoType, ModelName)
SELECT staging.ProductCode, staging.CustomerCode, staging.RecoRank, staging.RecoType, staging.ModelName
FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToProduct_Delta] staging
         LEFT JOIN CustomerToProduct main
                   ON main.ProductCode = staging.ProductCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0
  AND main.ProductCode IS NULL;

WITH cte AS (SELECT OfferId
                  , ProgramCode
                  , RunId
                  , OfferCode
                  , ProgramEngine
                  , MemberAccount
                  , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY
        OfferId,
        ProgramCode,
        RunId,
        OfferCode,
        ProgramEngine,
        MemberAccount
        ORDER BY
            OfferId,
            ProgramCode,
            RunId,
            OfferCode,
            ProgramEngine,
            MemberAccount
        ) row_num
             FROM [dbo].[OfferStagingRuning_Available])
DELETE
FROM cte
WHERE row_num > 1;

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- Handle clear cache
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXEC [dbo].[FlushCacheCouchBase]

set TransactionId = '@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}';
begin

if (exists (select top 1 1 from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA)) then

delete from  RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main using (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA  where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER)
      group by offerCode
 ) index_delete 
 where index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode ;
 

merge into RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main
using(
 select --top 100
  PROGRAMCODE, 
  CustomerToOffer.CustomerCode || '_' || targetUser.offercode as id, 
  CustomerToOffer.CustomerCode  as customercode, 
  targetUser.OFFERCODE,targetUser.PRODUCTCODE, targetUser.STORECODE
  from (
     select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE, offerCode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode , 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER
       where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA)
     group by offerCode
 ) targetUser
join  RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer on CustomerToOffer.OfferCode = targetUser.OfferCode) indexchange on  indexchange.Id = main.Id
when matched then update set
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
when not matched then insert (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
values (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);
end if;

IF  (exists(select top 1 1 from RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA where transactionid = $TransactionId)) then
delete from  RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main using (
     select CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE from RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE and transactionid = $TransactionId
 ) index_delete 
 where index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode and index_delete.CustomerCode = main.CUSTOMERCODE;


merge into RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main
using(
 select --top 100
  PROGRAMCODE, 
  CustomerToOffer_DELTA.CustomerCode || '_' || targetUser.offercode as id, 
  CustomerToOffer_DELTA.CustomerCode  as customercode, 
  targetUser.OFFERCODE,targetUser.PRODUCTCODE, targetUser.STORECODE
  from (
     select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE, offerCode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode , 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER
     group by offerCode
 ) targetUser
join  RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA on CustomerToOffer_DELTA.OfferCode = targetUser.OfferCode
and Metadata$Action = 'INSERT' and  transactionid = $TransactionId
) indexchange on indexchange.Id = main.Id
when matched then update set
                            PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
                            CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
when not matched then insert (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
values (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

end if;
end;

DELETE FROM RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main USING (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA  where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS)
      group by offerCode
 ) AS index_delete 
WHERE index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode;
 
MERGE INTO RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main
USING (
    select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE,
    'MASS_' || offercode as id, 
    'MASS' as CUSTOMERCODE,
     offerCode as offercode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode, 
     [] as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS
     where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA) 
     and PROGRAMCODE not in (select PROGRAMCODE from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERPROGRAM where ENGINE = 'HEALTH')
     and PROGRAMCODE != 'AUTO_LOAD_OFFERS'
     group by offerCode
 ) indexchange ON indexchange.Id = main.Id
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
VALUES (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

DELETE FROM RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main USING (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE)
      group by offerCode
 ) AS index_delete 
WHERE index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode;
 
MERGE INTO RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main
USING (
    select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE,
    'MASS_' || offercode as id, 
    'MASS' as CUSTOMERCODE,
     offerCode as offercode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode, 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE
     where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA) 
     group by offerCode
 ) indexchange ON indexchange.Id = main.Id
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
VALUES (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

BEGIN
INSERT INTO Rs_Schema.ElasticDocument_delta 
    (ROWID,PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE,METADATA$ACTION,METADATA$ISUPDATE,METADATA$ROW_ID,TRANSACTIONID)
SELECT ROWID,PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE,METADATA$ACTION,METADATA$ISUPDATE,METADATA$ROW_ID,'@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
FROM Rs_Schema.ElasticDocument_check
WHERE 
    Metadata$Action != 'DELETE' 
    OR (Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' 
        AND Metadata$IsUpdate = FALSE);

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE RS_SCHEMA.STAGINGELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA(
    partition_num NUMBER AUTOINCREMENT,
    ID VARCHAR,
    CUSTOMERCODE VARCHAR, 
    OFFERCODE VARCHAR,
    PRODUCTCODES ARRAY,
    STORECODES ARRAY,
    METADATA$ACTION VARCHAR(50),
    METADATA$ISUPDATE BOOLEAN
);

INSERT INTO RS_SCHEMA.STAGINGELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA 
(ID, CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, PRODUCTCODES, STORECODES, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE)
SELECT
    ID,
    CUSTOMERCODE, 
    OFFERCODE,
    PRODUCTCODE as PRODUCTCODES,
    STORECODE as STORECODES,
    METADATA$ACTION,
    METADATA$ISUPDATE
FROM RS_SCHEMA.ELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA
WHERE 
    TransactionId = '@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}';

END;

activities.name: Trigger StreamSets CRUD and Clear cache

dependsOn.activity: Trigger StreamSets CRUD and Clear cache
